backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, test requests, and contact submissions with authorization checks and basic CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a client-side PDF download feature for admin test request pages and related files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of various frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining color variables, themes, and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app root and main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and global toaster for the React app.
Component that checks authentication and admin status before rendering protected pages, showing UI prompts when access is denied.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying company info, contact details, and quick navigation links using shared branding and constants.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive site header with logo and navigation links for desktop and mobile using a sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the page with header, footer, and main outlet for routed content.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Renders grouped service categories with cards detailing various cable testing services.
Displays four featured service categories with icons and descriptions in a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Lists key reasons to choose the company, each with an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting and retrieving test requests, contact submissions, and user profiles using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global styling and typography rules.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports the path to the user-facing logo asset.
frontend/src/lib/companyInfo.ts: Provides static company details and a helper function to format the full address.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BookATest.tsx: Implements a form page for submitting testing requests with validation and success handling.
frontend/src/pages/ContactUs.tsx: Implements a contact form page with company info, validation, and submission workflow.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, lab highlights, and service overview sections.
frontend/src/pages/internal/ContactSubmi: Admin page listing contact form submissions with delete actions and authentication support.
frontend/src/pages/internal/TestRequests: React page that fetches, lists, deletes, and downloads PDFs for test requests using a table interface with actions.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Displays grouped testing services and includes a call‑to‑action to book a test.
frontend/src/utils/testRequestPdf.ts: Generates and opens a styled HTML report for a test request with company info and print-to-PDF support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site requirements, architecture notes, features, and current state for a responsive multi-page testing lab website.
